price: (53) And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault[1241] the unseen from a place far away.[1242]
arabic: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ
footnotes:
[1241]- Verbally, by conjecture and denial.
[1242]- i.e., a position far from truth.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqad kafarū bihi min qablu wayaqdhifūna bil-ghaybi min makānin baʿīdin
